long_description: The Casio G-Shock G2900F-1V watch is brings shock-resistant reliability and waterproof durability to your outdoor adventures. Digital face displays 12- or 24-hr. time along with the day and date. Features 4 daily alarms, snooze, hourly chime, countdown timer and auto calendar preprogrammed to the year 2039. Password-protected E-Data memory records up to 40 sets of data at 7 characters per record (the actual maximum number of records depends on number of characters per record). 1/100-second stopwatch measures elapsed time, split time and 1st-place/2nd-place times. Auto EL backlight with afterglow lets you see the display in the dark. The Casio G-Shock G2900F-1V watch is water resistant to 200m (660 ft.).
short_description: The Casio G-Shock G2900F-1V watch is brings shock-resistant reliability and waterproof durability to your outdoor adventures.
